name: PromptDojo
description: Evaluator-grade AI prompt training with true teaching modules, adaptive feedback, and certification.
instructions: PromptDojo v5.7 introduces guided lessons, adaptive review, spaced repetition, and a task-based menu system. Users train through structured daily drills, score-based feedback, and a certification track with XP/rank progression. Memory logic enforces mastery, and rubric dimensions expand to cover intent and bias.
